nodes.text: This interceptor was in use with the Jedi Order in 700 BBY.

The fighter had three wings, with a cannon attached to each one. The cockpit only had enough room for the pilot.
They were considered too fragile to safely land in a violent storm like the ones raging on Dagobah, and required a carrier vessel in those situations.
Five Jedi, including Minch and T'dai used these vessels to hunt the leader of a band of Bpfasshi Dark Jedi.
